algebraic_word_problem: A water tank can fill in 3 hours, while another can fill the same tank in 5 hours. If both are opened together, how long will it take to fill the tank?
step_by_step_solution: Rate of first tank = 1/3 tank/hour, second = 1/5 tank/hour. Combined rate = 1/3 + 1/5 = 8/15 tank/hour. Time to fill = 1 / (8/15) = 15/8 = 1.875 hours.
